envelope.message: Thank you. We are pleased to send you CHOICE free of charge. We'd like very much to hear from you!
envelope.certification: Please sign here to certify that you can be invited.

comments.like_best: What did you like best about this issue of CHOICE?
statements: Check only one box for each statement.
